LanguageData.AF_TH_FerianWantsGoHome.stages.0.label: Kind of homesick...
LanguageData.AF_TH_FerianWantsGoHome.stages.0.descrip: Stars are so beautiful, \nBut where are we really from.
LanguageData.AF_FerianBannerThink.stages.0.label: <color=#87b4ff>Stars</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBannerThink.stages.0.descriptio: If you look closely, you can see the blinking points of light. \nThat is the mark of our civilization in this beautiful "time".
